meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Sweet</kanji> <kanji>vinegar</kanji> is <vocabulary>sweet vinegar</vocabulary>. Them Japanese love their sweet things.
readingMnemonic: The reading is 甘い plus 酢, combined together. It's the kun'yomi readings, but that's probably because we're combing two words into one. It also changes the す to ず so, remember that.
